Microsoft&#8217;s Busy Bees: Swag of updates available for Windows Vista

Jan 29, 2007 • Aaron Parker

Someone at Microsoft didn’t get to take holidays between the RTM of Vista and the consumer release. Check out the updates available for Windows Vista today:

  • Update for Windows Vista (KB929427) [ Application compatibility fix ]
  • Update for Windows Vista (KB928089) [ Internet Explorer Phishing Filter performance fix ]
  • Update for Windows Vista (KB930163) [ VPN using wired/wireless networking fix ]
  • Update for Windows Vista (KB929777) [ storport.sys fix ]
  • Update for Windows Vista (KB929763) [ Mongolian Baiti font update ]
  • Update for Windows Vista (KB929762) [ Hibernation/IEEE 1394 HDD fix ]
  • Update for Windows Vista (KB929615) [ Windows Media Center audio fix ]

Each of these has a corresponding fix for the x64 version of Vista:

  • Update for Windows Vista for x64-based Systems (KB929427)
  • Update for Windows Vista for x64-based Systems (KB928089)
  • Update for Windows Vista for x64-based Systems (KB930163)
  • Update for Windows Vista for x64-based Systems (KB929777)
  • Update for Windows Vista for x64-based Systems (KB929763)
  • Update for Windows Vista for x64-based Systems (KB929762)
  • Update for Windows Vista for x64-based Systems (KB929615)

No knowledgebase articles yet, but all updates are available on Windows Update.
